md:
giải nghĩa từ "moonsoon" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan, các từ trái nghĩa.

- Moonsoon: (noun) a season of heavy rainfall in certain parts of the world, especially in South Asia.

- Dịch sang tiếng việt: Mùa mưa.

- Từ loại: danh từ.

- Câu ví dụ: The monsoon season in India is a time of great celebration.

- Các từ liên quan: rain, storm, flood, weather.

- Các từ trái nghĩa: drought, dryness, aridity.

Note: The word "monsoon" is often used to refer to the seasonal wind shift that brings heavy rainfall to certain regions, particularly in South Asia. However, in a broader sense, it can also refer to any season of heavy rainfall in general.

  • Câu ví dụ: The monsoon season in India is a time of great celebration.

  • Các từ liên quan: rain, storm, flood, weather.

  • Các từ trái nghĩa: drought, dryness, aridity.

Note: The word "monsoon" is often used to refer to the seasonal wind shift that brings heavy rainfall to certain regions, particularly in South Asia. However, in a broader sense, it can also refer to any season of heavy rainfall in general.
